alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 7:21PM CST until November 29 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CRITTENDEN...DESOTO...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL... NORTHEASTERN TUNICA...NORTHWESTERN TATE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 720 PM CST, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located over Southeast Memphis, or 7 miles northeast of Southaven, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, T O Fuller State Park, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Walls, Horseshoe Lake, Lake Cormorant, Southwest Memphis, Ellendale, Eudora, Lewisburg and Whitehaven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
